name: The Dabtivist
description:
Clair Pollution is the owner of the “southwest vitality skies”. But do not be fooled by the dabtastic name of this power plant. Clair Pollution cares not for the green in the world, but the green in her pockets.

She is the headmaster in the evil mega coal-poration, known for burning coal for power and pleasure. This impacts the environment that innocent citizens have to live in dabsticly. And while most of the population sits idly by our sustainability is in grave danger. But there is one, the coal-poration fear… His name... The Dabtivist.
